query:
ALTER TABLE challenges 
ADD COLUMN questionCount INT DEFAULT 10 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN complexity INT DEFAULT 5 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN focusArea ENUM('strengthen', 'improve', 'neutral') DEFAULT 'neutral' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN estimatedDuration INT,
ADD COLUMN difficultyDistribution JSON;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3jAcJMG4wP9JZTZ.root --database JbjjhFNe4aEjNxVY9pJJsJ --execute ALTER TABLE challenges 
ADD COLUMN questionCount INT DEFAULT 10 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN complexity INT DEFAULT 5 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN focusArea ENUM('strengthen', 'improve', 'neutral') DEFAULT 'neutral' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN estimatedDuration INT,
ADD COLUMN difficultyDistribution JSON;
